name: Galaxy Idle Game
description:
An incredibly simple idle style game. Expand into the entire galaxy to win (you can't lose and there's no real win state except your own feelings of joy). Watch ships move between stars. Requires a mouse. Game autosaves upon exit, delete autosave.sav in the game folder to reset the game.

Use -auto argument to have colony ships automatically sent out at the end of every year.

Drop into any Windows folder, run. Windows only, source code is available here as public domain, uses SFML and C++11: https://github.com/thedaian/galaxy
